doc:
Alexis Denisof https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alexis_Denisof 0 Alexis Denisof (born February 25, 1966) is an American actor who is primarily known for playing Wesley Wyndam-Pryce in the television series Buffy the Vampire Slayer and its spin-off Angel. He also had a recurring role on How I Met Your Mother on which his wife, Alyson Hannigan, starred. Alexis_Denisof ( born February_25_,_1966 ) is an_American_actor who is_primarily_known for playing Wesley_Wyndam-Pryce in the_television_series_Buffy the_Vampire_Slayer and its_spin-off_Angel . He also had a_recurring_role on How I Met Your_Mother on which his_wife , Alyson_Hannigan , starred .
